results.title: With ‘Summer of Soul,’ Questlove Wants to Fill a Cultural Void
results.abstract: “This just sat in a basement and no one cared,” Questlove said about the Harlem Cultural Festival footage he watched on loop for months to make his new, acclaimed documentary.
des_facet: Summer of Soul (... Or, When the Revolution Could Not Be Televised) (Movie)

results.title: It’s Not Easy Being Greenspeople
results.abstract: Transforming winter into spring or creating faux forests and fanciful estates is all in a day’s work for these behind-the-scenes masters of foliage on movie and TV sets.

results.title: Lydia Lunch’s Infinite Rebellion
results.abstract: “Good luck figuring me out,” the 62-year-old artist said. A new documentary called “The War Is Never Over” does its best.

multimedia.caption: “It’s the problems that are nihilistic, not me,” Lydia Lunch said. “I’m the most positive person I know.”

results.title: Ilana Glazer on the Terror of the Modern Birth System and ‘False Positive’
results.abstract: The “Broad City” co-creator starred in and co-wrote a horror film about pregnancy. It’s being released just as she is becoming a mother.
